к сожалению в этой игре вы не узнаете что делали ваши родичи вчера вечерам, кем они работают, и какой болезни они умрут. Зато если вы наиграете в неё хотя бы 100 часов и будете в ней шарить тогда вы подписали для себя полнейший разрыв жопы, ваши мозги взорвутся, а из жопу будет выходить огонь, вообщем то вам всем пизда и удачи.

Nunca jugué tanto a este juego, me lo compré hace un año mas o menos, y la verdad que nunca le di pelota, mi hermano me dijo que lo empezara a jugar y la verdad me vicie, es un juego que te hace sacar gritos, o risas con cosas que pueda llegar a pasar, es mejor jugarlo con amigos, muy bueno...
очень прикольная игра но только есть некоторые баги

Научится можно играть и на начальных персонажах (я не смог) а некоторых можно открыть за игровую валюту (если оно вам надо) ну или крайней случай есть храм тайн (если повезёт) ,а так ждите распродажу на DLC если хотите что то новое.
Короче положение не без выходное. И главное "выход - это не выход"
it's the same fricking thing every time. Boring.
这游戏把握了很好的一个度，让玩家玩这游戏不会产生巨大恐惧，而是肾上腺加速分泌带来了更多兴奋。

Group matchmaking in this game is broken.  Getting into a game solo is just fine, but matchmaking with friends is a pain. Half the time the game doesn't register that your group has readied. The other you get thrown into different games. Until that is fixed, I don't recommend this game unless you will never play with friends.

This game is seriously addicting! I wish a lot of the characters weren't hidden behind pay walls, but the game is still extremely fun.  Idk about others, but I get legit scared when I hear the heartbeat and know the killer is just around the corner lol.
It's good when the game works, which is 75% of the time.
I played this game on xbox ofr the longest time before finally getting a pc, I absolutely love this game and all it stands for.
Ta bueno, esta re mal equilibrado. Los killers tienen mucha ventaja. Dan asco los killers campers y tienen que hacer un metodo anti campeo y anti tuneleo. Hay demasiadas cosas por modificar

Good game, I just love being camped and tunneled by baby killers. 10/10 will troll more campers again.
游戏很好玩，是一款地穴探险类游戏（类似让你在一个空间里找东西）就是玩生存者找不到电机但是总能找到屠夫，玩屠夫找不到生存者但是总能找到发光的电机和敞开的大门，而且对手总是在羞辱我，感觉像是苍蝇追着SHIT但是SHIT却飞的比苍蝇还快。
its really cool and this games skilled base too i recomend it
toxic killers sometime but other than that it's pretty good.
国服排不到人 外服的人太弱 纠结
Totalmente entretenido y bueno para jugar con amigos, las risas nunca faltan
Si este juego no gana premio a "con amor y dedicación" rompo algo :)
Prefiero dispararme la rodilla con una flecha.

Ну что можно сказать, своих денег игра определённо стоит, а это уже немало. Немного поиграв сразу же захотелось пересмотреть немало фильмов ужасов, даже несмотря на то что я их  не очень люблю. Атмосфера в игре передана на отлично, что будет дальше посмотрим.
В конечном итоге дальнейший успех игры зависит от количества карт и убийц добавленных в будущем, ну и отточки баланса конечно же.
Интересно играть как с друзьями так и одному. Система прокачки весьма интересная и разветвлённая. Не знаю насколько её хватит, но своё она уже окупила. Однозначно рекомендую!
Muito bom,acho super divertido e viciante,pra quem curte jogos do gênero eu super recomendo,ainda mais quando se joga com amigos!!

Game periodically crashes to desktop, triggering matchmaking ban that locks you out of being able to play for up to 6 hours from what I've seen so far. Devs seem more focused on battlepass/microtransactions than making the game more stable. Server issues frequently kick me out of lobbies and also make forming a party with friends very frustrating at times.

The core game design itself is pretty fun though. If the software and servers weren't mired with issues then I would have recommended this game to newcomers that might be on the fence about an asymmetrical PvP game. I have been playing this game on and off for years and it doesn't feel like they're reducing the number and severity of bugs.
muito bom da pra se divertir d+ com os amigos, e tbm até sozinho jogando de killer
crossplay ruined the game. console survivors are p*ssies
Está super chingon para jugar con amigos
se for começar a jogar agora, pense duas vezes. jogo todo bugado.
Best Game to play with Friends

Look, if you want a game wherein you and your friends can run away from pop culture's best monstrous killers, or wield the various infamous weapons and powers yourself to hunt down survivors in groups of four, this is that game. They've got events, an interesting leveling system, and a variety of killers and survivors to choose from. Pick up a med kit or a couple of hatchets and GET ON IT!
¡Juego muy divertido donde sobrevivir a todos esos monstruos que nos aterrorizaban en películas o series de miedo o incluso jugar con los mismos!

No entiendo porque cuando juego al dbd mi grafica sube a 83 grados con el msi afterburner y los ventiladores al 90, no me pasa con ningun otro juego, hay amigos que les pasa y otros que no. No entiendo que puede ser, si alguien sabe, porfavor comenten.
Adorei o jogo e para a minha sorte ainda roda liso com o processador de 2014 :D

Dead by Daylight is something that everyone should have in their steam library the games premise is 4 survivors vs 1 killer and you have a wide variety to whom you want to play as, you can play as many some of the most notable are Freddy and Myers. The lore is something you can get into if you really want to, to what I was told the entire game is like purgatory or hell, as the 'Entity' is the "Satan/God" of it all. If you do get into the game I suggest you spend a little money and get Cannibal or Lauri for your first buy as they arguably have the best perks in the game. (Barbecue and Chili, Ds). This is coming from a Killer main but survivor is ok to play when playing with your friends but if you aren't I suggest you play killer. In red ranks (the highest in the game) kind of like Global Elite or Diamond in r6 its ranked. It gets much harder, a small issue I've had so far playing the game is that I got to rank 6 killer and its been a little harder, but most times you can still pop off with a 3 kill or 4 kill game. 
you need to pick a killer that fits your playstyle as a main obviously. But you are most likely going to have to spend a little extra money on the game so I do suggest you don't buy the deluxe version. the Licensed killers like (Myers, Freddy, Ghost Face, Cannibal (Leather Face), Pyramid head, and Pig) all cost money and you cannot grind for them.

But thats really it to be honest, just some things you need to know I guess. I also suggest that you watch Otzdarva or maybe TrueTalent as they are some experts at the game and could teach you some things from gameplay. 9/10 for DBD it just has some bugs and fixes that will probably come soon.
Os cara so sabe adicionar bug meu deus.
A fun and scary game. To play with friends or solo :D Although there are some glitches with the "windowhitframes" I recommend this game for every horrorfan!
С друзьями в самый раз,одному уже не то

This game is very garbage from it's mechanics and how you play it. Even if you hate it, somehow you still come back to it lol.

Wouldn't suggest, but you will get addicted after a short amount of time and that's a bad thing.

Игра полное дисбалансное дерьмо! 4 года 600 часов а разрабы только и думают о том как положить ваши деньги в свой карман! Игре 4е года а проблемы всё те же! автонаведение манов , удары через доски и прочее! А про дисбаланс манов и сурвов и говорить глупо! Это проект который в свое время выстрелил и не хочет меняться!

Não comprem este jogo.
Sim, ele é bom, mas lançou em 2016 e nunca o otimizaram como deveriam, mas DLC sempre têm. A não ser que teu PC seja um um tanto acima da média, não vale a pena.
